tool_description: Provides a set of API for generating strong passwords, checking a password strength, generating a password hash and verifying it.
name: Password Tools
title: Password Tools

api_list.name: generate
api_list.description: Generates a random password. You can optionally choose the length (default is 8) and the amount of numeric characters, uppercase letters or symbols

api_list.name: checkStrength
api_list.description: Strength level of a provided password.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pozzad-passwords.p.rapidapi.com/passwordtools/checkstrength/s3cr3t"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pozzad-passwords.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pozzad-passwords.p.rapidapi.com/passwordtools/checkstrength/{password}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pozzad-passwords.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: checkHash
api_list.description: verifies that a plain text password (usually submitted by the user) matches the previously generated (and stored) hash

optional_parameters.name: password
optional_parameters.description: the plain text password to be checked against the hash

api_list.name: hash
api_list.description: Generates a password hash by using the OpenBSD-style Blowfish-based bcrypt.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pozzad-passwords.p.rapidapi.com/passwordtools/hash/s3cr3t"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pozzad-passwords.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

url = "https://pozzad-passwords.p.rapidapi.com/passwordtools/hash/{password}"
